FROM nginx

RUN rm /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
ADD default.conf /etc/nginx/conf.d/

EXPOSE 80

EXPOSE 443

COPY dist/  /usr/share/nginx/html/

CMD [â€œnginxâ€, â€œ-gâ€, â€œdaemon off;â€]

ç„¶åè¿˜éœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ª default.conf æ¥æ›¿æ¢ nginx çš„é»˜è®¤é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå†…å®¹å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

server {

listen       80;#nginx é»˜è®¤ç›‘å¬ 80 ç«¯å£ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ”¹æˆå…¶ä»–çš„
    server_name  å…¬ç½‘ ip;
    #server_name  åŸŸå;å¦‚æœæœ‰åŸŸåï¼Œè§£æåå¯ä»¥ç”¨åŸŸåï¼Œä¸ç”¨ ip

location / {
        root   /usr/share/nginx/html;
        index  index.html index.htm;
        try_files $uri $uri/ /index.html =404;
    }

# åç«¯æ¥å£è½¬å‘

location /api/ {
        proxy_pass http://å…¬ç½‘ ip:8081;  # è½¬å‘åˆ°åç«¯æœåŠ¡ 8081 ç«¯å£
        proxy_set_header Host $host;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
    }
    error_page   500 502 503 504  /50x.html;
    location = /50x.html {
        root   html;
    }
}
